string.text: Electronic timer. Developed for special units in the Russian army. Shock resistant and water resistant. Withstands immersion up to 300 meters. Equipped with a timer and stopwatch. New units were repeatedly stolen away by a military scout from the special forces warehouse Bibik (D-3) and sold to wholesale dealers in the Area. The scout for these crimes was sentenced to death three times, but thanks to the proverbial 'Fear of Death' syndrome, the stalker has managed to survive after the enforcement of sentencing.
